scripts.fix:all: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build
scripts.test: set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/api/__tests__/client.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/hooks/__tests__/useFormState.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/hooks/__tests__/useTheme.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/hooks/__tests__/validateForm.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/pages/configuration/hooks/__tests__/useConfigurationState.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/stores/__tests__/authStore.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/stores/__tests__/uiStore.test.ts && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/components/ui/__tests__/Button.test.tsx && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/components/ui/__tests__/Card.test.tsx && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/components/ui/__tests__/Input.test.tsx && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/components/ui/__tests__/Modal.test.tsx && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/features/config/queries/__tests__/useProjects.test.tsx && node ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run src/features/config/queries/__tests__/useSimTypes.test.tsx
